next_steps.note: "Define Network Scanning Scope: Document the target network(s), desired scan frequency, and types of scans to be performed (e.g., ping sweep, port scan, vulnerability scan).",
"Select Network Scanning Tool: Research and choose a network scanning tool (e.g., Nmap, Masscan, OpenVAS) based on requirements and budget. Document the chosen tool and justification.",

"Develop Initial Scan Configuration: Create a basic scan configuration for the chosen tool, including target specification, port ranges, and basic scan options. Test on a safe/isolated network first.",

"Establish Logging & Reporting Framework: Determine how scan results will be logged, stored, and reported. Consider integration with existing security information and event management (SIEM) systems.",
"Create a Test Plan for Validation: Outline a plan to validate the accuracy and effectiveness of the network scanning configuration. Include expected results and acceptance criteria."
